Description:
IN.CMG.030322.A-312317703
You have failed to organise the exterior yard areas of your workplace in such a way that pedestrians and vehicles (Forklift trucks, HGVs and other work vehicles) can circulate in a safe manner so far is as reasonably practicable. Specifically you have failed to provide suitable and sufficient marked pedestrian walkways, pedestrian crossings, and warning signage.
